description: The ceremony takes place under a majestic floral arch, surrounded by loved ones.
Imagine walking into a sun-drenched garden with a gentle breeze carrying the scent of flowers.
Stepping into a quaint, historic chapel adorned with lace and candles, guests are transported to a bygone era.
The ceremony is filled with old-world charm, from the romantic vows to the nostalgic melodies played by a live jazz band.
Surrounded by azure waters and golden sands, the couple exchanges vows on a secluded beach at sunset.
The ceremony is intimate yet breathtaking, with the ocean as a backdrop and the soft glow of tiki torches illuminating the scene.
